tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Payroll (
  payroll_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  hours_worked DECIMAL,
  hourly_rate DECIMAL,
  total_pay DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    work_date DATE,
    hours_worked FLOAT,
    hourly_rate FLOAT,
    total_pay FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hourly_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WorkHours (
    workhour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    work_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeTasks (
    employee_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    workhour_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(employee_id, task_id, workhour_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    workhour_id INT,
    hours_worked DECIMAL,
    total_pay DECIMAL
)
